bibl.title: A Textual Survey of Greek Inscriptions from Panopolis and the Panopolite.
bibl.note: Un aperçu de la documentation épigraphique grecque du Panopolite, y compris les épitaphes chrétiennes. - Pp. 63-67: le monument de Ptolémaios alias Agrios (I. métriques 114); - 67-69: Liste des inscriptions.

bibl.title: Perspectives on Panopolis: An Egyptian Town from Alexander the Great to the Arab Conquest. Acts from an International Symposium Held in Leiden on 16, 17 and 18 December 1998

bibl.seg: CRISCUOLO Lucia, A Textual Survey of Greek Inscriptions from Panopolis and the Panopolite.

A. EGBERTS, B.P. MUHS and J. VAN DER VLIET (Edd.), Perspectives on Panopolis: An Egyptian Town from Alexander the Great to the Arab Conquest. Acts from an International Symposium Held in Leiden on 16, 17 and 18 December 1998 = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXXI (Leiden, 2002) pp. 55-69.

Un aperçu de la documentation épigraphique grecque du Panopolite, y compris les épitaphes chrétiennes. - Pp. 63-67: le monument de Ptolémaios alias Agrios (I. métriques 114); - 67-69: Liste des inscriptions.
